job_tasks.phrase: As a Software Engineer in ISE specializing in AI Platform, you willteam upwithotherISEengineerson customer engagements involving Microsofts AI offerings such as Azure ML, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure OpenAI, other related MS technologies such as Azure Cognitive Search or open source AI tooling.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core function of a software engineer working with AI technologies, implying integration into customer solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams, you will develop real-world technical experience that helps customers grow their business and Microsoft to improve our products and services.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the software engineering aspect of working with customer teams and contributing to product improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: We develop solutions side-by-side with our customers through collaborative innovation to solve their challenges.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the software development and integration aspect of building solutions with customers.

job_tasks.phrase: This work involves the development of broadly applicable, high-impact solution patterns and open-source software assets that contribute to the Microsoft platform.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly points to software development and the creation of reusable assets.

job_tasks.phrase: In this role, you will be working with engineers from your team and our customers teams to apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the software engineering role, focusing on applying skills to solve customer challenges.

job_tasks.phrase: Identify deep insights from customer engagements and partner with the product group on using customer needs and insights to guide future product roadmap
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding customer needs and translating them into product roadmaps, which is a business understanding and strategic task.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in architecture design sessions and coding sprints working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers to help them make good design decisions specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops.
job_tasks.justification: This describes participation in software design and coding sprints, directly related to building AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: specifically around building good AI solutions, for example ML Ops.
job_tasks.justification: MLOps is explicitly mentioned as a focus area for building AI solutions, falling under operations and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: You will also partner closely with our data science team on customer engagements.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates collaboration with data science teams within the context of customer engagements, implying integration of AI/ML into solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Be a hands-on software engineer where needed, so youll need to be able to write quality code.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement about being a hands-on software engineer and writing code.

job_tasks.phrase: We often bring Data & AI depth expertise to the existing ISE industry engineering crew that has end-to-end ownership of the customer engagement.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights bringing AI expertise to an engineering crew with end-to-end ownership, suggesting integration into broader engineering efforts.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization to strategically invest in building reusable assets and playbooks built from our customer experiences.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves collaboration to build reusable software assets and playbooks, which is a software engineering activity.

soft_skills.phrase: the ability to quickly upskill and unblock others is the key to success.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the importance of rapid learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: By interacting with our customers engineering teams and Microsofts product engineering teams, you will develop real-world technical experience
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes interaction and collaboration with customer and product engineering teams.

soft_skills.phrase: working alongside ISE engineers and customer engineers
soft_skills.justification: This indicates collaboration with other engineers.

soft_skills.phrase: partner closely with our data science team
soft_skills.justification: This points to close collaboration with another specialized team.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with other members of the team and the broader organization
soft_skills.justification: This is a direct mention of collaboration within the team and the organization.

soft_skills.phrase: apply your skills, perspectives, and creativity to grow as engineers and help solve our customer challenges.
soft_skills.justification: This implies using creativity and skills to solve challenges, suggesting an innovative and ownership-driven approach.

soft_skills.phrase: Our team prides itself on embracing a growth mindset, inspiring excellence, and encouraging everyone to share their unique viewpoints and be their authentic selves.
soft_skills.justification: Embracing a growth mindset directly relates to learning and adaptability.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks (development, integration, coding, architecture design, reusable assets) within Macro-Category A. While it mentions AI offerings like Azure ML, Azure OpenAI, and MLOps, the core responsibilities are about building and integrating these into customer solutions rather than deep model development or GenAI specialization. The role is described as a 'Software Engineer' who works with AI platforms, fitting the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the software engineering nature of the role, explicitly stating 'As a Software Engineer' and detailing software development tasks. The mention of AI technologies is in the context of integration and application, not core AI research or model building. The responsibilities align well with the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.
